hero.title: Fullstack developer with an engineering mindset
hero.subtitle: With an analytical background, I've transitioned from finance to development. I work with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Node.js to build meaningful solutions.

about.name: Viktoriia Semenchuk
about.title: About me
about.intro: I'm a full-stack developer at the beginning of my career, passionate about innovation, teamwork, and lifelong learning. A harmonious work environment motivates me, and I see constructive feedback as an opportunity to grow and achieve better results together.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on, showcasing my skills in web development and programming.

collaborate.title: Want to collaborate?
collaborate.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects. Let's build something amazing together!
